channel.title: How can I add ::empty
channel.description:
I want to add ::empty
I also want to edit the teleports. I do not have a texthandler.java file.
I am using Project Insanity.

item.title: How can I add ::empty
item.dc:creator: @Ddragonimp Ddragonimp
item.description:
@Ddragonimp wrote:

something that would be nice is having the items drop on the ground just a suggestion definitly not a requirement i’ve noticed no one seems to code that in.

Read full topic

item.title: How can I add ::empty
item.dc:creator: @Scape-JAVA Scape-JAVA
item.description:
@Scape-JAVA wrote:

if (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("empty")) { c.getPA().removeAllItems(); c.sendMessage("You empty your inventory"); }
derp.

Either that or this, not sure loool.

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("empty")) { for (int i = 0; i < 28; i++) { playerItems[i] = 0; playerItemsN[i] = 0; } }

I haven’t touched an rsps for ever.

Read full topic
